links.title: One Man SaaS Architecture
links.description: Anthony Simon shares interesting details about his one-man SaaS Panelbear.

links.title: SVG Generators
links.description: You won't need any other bookmarks again. This is a full list of SVG generators for every use case.

links.description: A collection of the most scary, interesting or weird things around computer technology.

links.description: If you host any website, please opt out of Google's FLoC network, which intrudes the users privacy.

links.description: Natto is a tool for fidgeting with JavaScript. Write and manipulate JavaScript expressions on a spatial canvas.
